name: hours_inquiry
description: Responses for when a user asks about business hours
responses: Our salon is open Monday through Wednesday from 10:00 AM to 7:00 PM, Thursday and Friday from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM, Saturday from 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM, and Sunday from 11:00 AM to 5:00 PM. When would you like to visit us?
We're open 7 days a week! Our hours are: Monday-Wednesday: 10AM-7PM, Thursday-Friday: 9AM-8PM, Saturday: 9AM-6PM, Sunday: 11AM-5PM. Is there a specific day you'd like to come in?
Delane Nails is open Monday to Friday with extended hours on Thursday and Friday (until 8PM). We're also open on weekends - Saturday from 9AM-6PM and Sunday from 11AM-5PM.
Our operating hours are: Mon-Wed 10AM-7PM, Thu-Fri 9AM-8PM, Sat 9AM-6PM, and Sun 11AM-5PM. Would you like to book an appointment during these times?
